welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kaunas, Lithuania! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this historic city, known for its beautiful architecture, vibrant arts scene, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Kaunas has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mtevani Georgian Cuisine
restaurants.description: Mtevani Georgian Cuisine is a bistro located in Kaunas.

restaurants.name: Kuhne
restaurants.description: Kuhne is a burger joint located in Kaunas.

restaurants.name: Žalia Pupa
restaurants.description: Žalia Pupa is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Kaunas.

restaurants.name: uoksas . creative cuisine
restaurants.description: uoksas . creative cuisine is a modern european restaurant located in Kaunas.

restaurants.name: DIA
restaurants.description: DIA is a modern european restaurant located in Kaunas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kaunas Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kaunas Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
